list.title: Data Scientist
list.activity: I am one of the main maintainers of POPAI, Dataswati's main AI library. I work on 4 main projects/clients with different subjects in Machine Learning and Data Science.

list.title: Founder & Web Dev & Blogger
list.activity: Math2IT is a Vietnamese community on mathematics, education and technology. I writes about mathematics and technology in an intuitive way. I'm also the admin of a community on mathematics and technology on Facebook.

list.title: Researcher in Applied Maths & Coder
list.activity: I researched on the growth of biofilm by using Finite Element Method, a numerical analysis method. Thesis's title is "Finite Element Methods for nonlinear interface problems. Application to a bioﬁlm growth model". For the implementation, I used FreeFem++ and self-built NXFEM toolbox.

list.title: Data Scientist
list.activity: I've learned by myself Data Science from the online courses.

list.title: Doctor in Applied Maths
list.activity: I researched on the growth of biofilm by using Finite Element Method, a numerical analysis method. Thesis's title is "Finite Element Methods for nonlinear interface problems. Application to a bioﬁlm growth model". For the implementation, I used FreeFem++ and self-built NXFEM toolbox.

list.title: Master in Applied Maths
list.activity: My master degree was registered in this University but I studied most of time in Vietnam and took an internship at University Paris 13.

list.where: Ho Chi Minh City Pedagogical U.
